text:
Four Days Of Wedding Celebrations For Priyanka Chopra-Nick Jonas. Here Are The Deets!
Four Days Of Wedding Celebrations For Priyanka Chopra-Nick Jonas. Here Are The Deets!
The season of weddings have just begun. After Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone's big, fat shaadi, now it's time to rejoice for another celebrity couple who is all set to tie the knot.
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas are all set to tie the knot in December this year and the preps are already on in full swing. PC's mother Madhu Chopra did a recce of the location a few days back and now, PC and Nick will personally go and handle all the arrangements, claim reports.
(Also read: Nick Jonas Is Having A Ball At His Bachelor’s Party & Priyanka Chopra Is Lovestruck Over His Sexy Avatar)
Nick Jonas has already landed in India and he joined PC in Delhi, where she is shooting for her upcoming film 'The Sky is Pink'.
In case, you are wondering what lies ahead for the couple, we have all the deets about their wedding functions.
Don't Miss 186 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES
Bombay Times took to Twitter to tweet the schedule.
Here's an update about @priyankachopra and @nickjonas
Wedding schedule
29th November - Mehndi and Sangeet
30th November - Cocktail Party
1st December - Haldi
2nd December - Wedding Ceremony pic.twitter.com/QFMSxKUV28 — BombayTimes (@bombaytimes) November 22, 2018
title: Four Days Of Wedding Celebrations For Priyanka Chopra-Nick Jonas. Here Are The Deets!
